welcomeMessage.message: Welcome! My name is DOMbot! Dom built me to respond exactly as he would. Here are things I can help with:

Send Email.message: Dom will be glad to hear from you! Tap the button below to open your email client

Call Him.message: Dom will be glad to hear from you! If you are on a cell phone, you can just tap the button below to make the call. If not, his number is 513-291-7758
